title: @Riot I think this is a scam (of course it is)
body:
I got a email recently requesting a password reset. Which i did not request. 

The supports email was: accounts@riotgames.com

Is this an official email of yours rito?

replies.body: It's definitely good to be cautious, and our[ emails from riot guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751784-Emails-from-Riot-Games) can help verify legit emails.  Your last password reset was a little bit ago, so it would be a good idea to change it anyway as well as the password to your email.  You can also reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) if you have any questions specific to your account.
